member.name: T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when one or more exceptions have occurred at the CardSpace service level. The cause of the error will be logged in the event log.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with serialized data.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with the specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The that represents the cause of the current exception.

member.name: T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceSelector
member.summary: Provides access to all CardSpace public operations that are supported in managed code.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceSelector.GetToken(System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpacePolicyElement[],System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer)
member.summary: Generates a security token using the CardSpace system and the specified policy chain and token serializer.
member.param: An array of that describes the federated security chain that the client requires a final token to unwind.
A that can read a clause.
member.returns: A that represents the generated security token.

member.summary: Generates a security token using the CardSpace system and the specified endpoint, policy, token issuer, and token serializer.
member.param: An that represents the endpoint address of the recipient where the token is presented.
An of type that contains a policy fragment that specifies the token types and claims that are requested by the recipient.
An that represents the issuer of the token.
A that can read a clause.
member.returns: A that represents the generated security token.

member.name: M:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CardSpaceSelector.Manage
member.summary: Displays the CardSpace management user interface that allows the user to create, delete, rename, and modify the card.
